Detailed Description

Function Documentation

static int32_t I2C_slave_control ( I2CSlave_Handle  handle,
uint32_t  cmd,
void *  arg 
)
static

Description
The function is the registered callback function which is invoked when the I2C Slave Driver is being passed a control command.

Parameters
[in]handleHandle to the I2C Driver
[in]cmdI2C command
[in]argOpaque handle to the argument
Return values
Success- 0
Error- I2C Error code
static void I2C_slave_init ( I2CSlave_Handle  handle)
static

Description
The function is the registered callback function which is invoked when the I2C Slave driver is initialized.

Return values
Notapplicable
static I2CSlave_Handle I2C_slave_open ( I2CSlave_Handle  handle,
const I2CSlave_Params *  params 
)
static

Description
The function is the registered callback function which is invoked when the I2C Slave Driver instance is being opened with a specific application supplied arguments.

Parameters
[in]handleHandle to the I2C Driver
[in]paramsI2C Parameters with which the driver is being opened
Return values
Success- Driver Handle
Error- NULL
bool I2C_slave_read ( I2CSlave_Handle  handle,
void *  buffer,
size_t  size 
)

Description
The function is the registered callback function which is invoked to perform a slave read.

Parameters
[in]handleHandle to the I2C Driver.
[in]bufferPointer to an empty buffer in which the received data should be written to.
[in]sizeThe number of bytes to be written into buffer.
Return values
Success- true
Error- false
bool I2C_slave_write ( I2CSlave_Handle  handle,
const void *  buffer,
size_t  size 
)

Description
The function is the registered callback function which is invoked to perform a slave write.

Parameters
[in]handleHandle to the I2C Driver.
[in]bufferPointer to the buffer containing data to be written to the slave.
[in]sizeThe number of bytes in buffer that should be written to the slave.
Return values
Success- true
Error- false
static void I2CSlave_blockingTransferCallback ( I2CSlave_Handle  handle,
bool  transferStatus 
)
static

Description
The function is the callback function which is invoked to indicate a transfer is complete when BLOCKING mode is used.

Parameters
[in]handleHandle to the I2C Driver
[in]transferStatusStatus of the transfer
Return values
Notapplicable
static void I2CSlave_ISR ( uintptr_t  arg)
static

Description
The function is the registered ISR for the I2C Slave Driver.

Parameters
[in]argArgument which is registered with the OS while registering the ISR
Return values
Notapplicable
static bool I2CSlave_setupTransfer ( I2CSlave_Handle  handle,
uint8_t *  buffer,
size_t  size,
uint32_t  readWriteFlag 
)
static

Description
The function sets up the read or write transfer.

Parameters
[in]handleHandle to the I2C Driver
[in]bufferData buffer to read data from or write data to
[in]sizeNumber of bytes to read or write
[in]readWriteFlagIndicate the type of operation 1: Write operation 0: Read operation
Return values
Notapplicable
void I2CSlaveEnable ( I2CRegs *  i2cRegs)

Enables the I2C module in slave mode. This will bring the I2C module out of reset.

Parameters
[in]i2cRegsMemory address of the I2C instance used.
Return values
Notapplicable
